channel.title: Pvp isint working, anywhere, only mage
channel.description:
Hey, here's my issue.
I have this 517 source, named Abbyscap3, I'm sure it's familiar to most of you guys, however, here's my problem...
In PVP or BH or anywhere in the wilderness, no one can attack anyone. I can only use magic on people, but, not melee (not sure about range). Does anyone know how to add the attack option so people can actually fight via melee and range?
Please, keep in mind..the "Attack PLAYER" when you right click on the person's name is there...it just doesn't attack unless if you use barrage on the person.
Is there a way to enable melee?

item.title: Pvp isint working, anywhere, only mage
item.dc:creator: @12igon8 12igon8
item.description:
@12igon8 wrote:

thats a little bit different to 562’s heres wut 562 entity.java looks like

} public boolean multiZone() { return getLocation().getX() >= 2756 && getLocation().getX() <= 2875 && getLocation().getY() >= 5512 && getLocation().getY() <= 5627; }

as you can see its a multipk zone and the coords r to show where it is and stuff, soz i havnt fooled around with 517 yet

Read full topic

item.title: Pvp isint working, anywhere, only mage
item.dc:creator: @pillow pillow
item.description:
@pillow wrote:

package net.com.codeusa.model;

/**

  • @author Fudge runescapejw191@yahoo.com <rune-server.org>
    */

interface Entity {

public int getX();

public int getY();

public int getHeight();

public int getPlayerId();

public String getMessageString(int economyId);

public int getLoginSpellbook();

public int getLoginSpecial();

public void updatePlayer(boolean updateIsNeccesary);

public void checkAmount();

public void playerWalk(int x, int y, int emote, int delay);

public void appendExperience(int amount, int skillId);

public void resetAttack();

public void appendDeath();

public boolean skillCapeEquiped();

public void loadStaticObjects();

public void setGodWarsStrings();

public void convertPlayerToNpc(int npcType);

public void updatePlayerAppearance(int walkAnim, int standAnim, int runAnim);

public void appendToBanned(String player);

public boolean clanWarsFightArea();

}

Is what i got, wtf do i do.

Read full topic
